trends: There has been one other sighting in Two Rivers
There were no other sightings in Two Rivers on or around October 21st 2013
divs: sighting detailsfueled truck returning home 7:45pm heading in a easterly direction. observed 3 bright objects that appeared to be over lake michigan. objects appeared to be in tight formation. weather was overcast and dark. overcast ceiling approximate 1500ft +-. objects had a bright strawberry color. i than observed a fourth object which appeared to be hoovering along the lake shore moving very slowly in a se direction separate from the original 3 objects. extremely bright strawberry color. no navigation lights observed. pulled over turned truck off and opened window. no sound heard, unusual i thought i'd hear something being so close estimating 1\2 mile or closer. arrived home entered yard observed the first 3 object climbed what i think was a vertical direction very quickly losing sight. lost visibility of the 4th object in the tree lines and neighbors roof. after going inside i went directly onto computer and checked the live radar for my area and saw no aircraft in the vicinity of my city. i've never seen aircraft with such a odd color, i'm 50 and grew up next to uscg air group. i also served in the usmc and never observed such a bright strange strawberry light. max time from entering house to reviewing radar perhaps 1 to 1 1\2 minutes.
